MemoryInfobox.description: 'When one gained audience with the Spartan Two Kings of Sparta|kings, it was customary to provide a kingly gift. Having arrived empty-handed however, Kassandra was tasked with bringing back the head of a Lykaon Wolf|legendary wolf.'

General_Description: '''A Legendary Hunt''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Disregarding tradition and customs, Kassandra sought favor from the [[Two Kings of Sparta]] without a gift to give in return. Due to this, King [[Archidamos of Sparta|Archidamos]] demanded she rid [[Lakonia]] of the [[Lykaon Wolf]], said to harass farmers in the [[Dioskouroi Peninsula]].
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The size of it... That's no ordinary wolf!
There it is!''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra hunted down the Lykaon Wolf and claimed its head as proof of her success. She also received the [[Wolfslayer's Breastplate]] for her efforts.
Section_Trivia:
*This quest is missable. Doing [[Bully the Bullies]] and/or [[One Bad Spartan Spoils the Bunch]] quests locks this out.
*The hero's comment when Ikaros scans the beast is the default comment available in [[The Lykaon Wolf]], immediately followed by the more generic comment for this quest. The subtitles for the second will replace the first after only a few frames, making it much more difficult to notice.
*Though King Archidamos demands this, there are no consequences for either completing or skipping the quest.
